game.name: Xenosensory
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Xenosensory is a short incremental casual game with horror themes. Use your cursor to bust Xenos and save convicts then spend your research points on skill tree upgrades, actions, gadgets, and uncover the true horrifying nature of this space station nightmare.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Xenosensory is a short incremental casual game with horror themes. Use your cursor to bust Xenos and save convicts then spend your research points on skill tree upgrades, actions, gadgets, and uncover the true horrifying nature of this space station nightmare.
